dct_title_s: La situation de la ville de Jerusalem
dct_alternative_sm: La situation de la ville de Ierusalem
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Features illustrations of structures, people, an angel, and biblical events.
Includes index: Declaration en nombre chiffr√©.
Shows topography, drainage, vegetation, places of historical interest.
Pictorial vignette: Le Temple de Salomon.
